scripts.start: http-server & npm run watch-ab-less & npm run watch-ab-coffee
scripts.start-pg: http-server & npm run watch-pg-less & npm run watch-pg-coffee
scripts.build: npm run build-ab-less && npm run build-ab-coffee && npm run build-pg
scripts.build-pg: npm run build-pg-less && npm run build-pg-coffee
scripts.watch-ab-coffee: watchify -t [ hbsfy -e thtml ] -t coffeeify axolotl/src/app.coffee -o public/assets/axolotl.js
scripts.build-ab-coffee: browserify -t [ hbsfy -e thtml ] -t coffeeify axolotl/src/app.coffee -o public/assets/axolotl.js
